column4: I have a game dvd and want to install the game with wine. When I try to start the setup.exe with wine it tells me to set the executeable bit of that file first. I can not set the bit since the file is on a bought readonly DVD! What can I do?
mount the whole cd with different permissions
can I set the mount permissions gnome uses to mount automaticaly?
don't know. but the parameter for mount should be umask=777
